subject: Attention Beneficiary fund,
body:
Attention Beneficiary fund,
I am writing to inform you that today is Thursday being 24th of August, I am very sure that I sent you mail before, but you did not take it seriously, today I am sending you the same mail again because I am not feeling happy whenever I see your transaction details here on my table as unpaid and incomplete transaction and I am very sorry and surprised as you have decided and feel to abandon your payment just because of the fee while you know that this fund can change your life, you aware that I real want to help you and make this transaction happen without any delay, I sent you this message before and I'm still re-sending it back to you once again, I real want you to receive your fund because it sound very bad and so sad that you lose your payment transfer just because of the fee, I don't know why you just want to abandon your valid payment transfer just for nothing, can you see that you are the one who delaying your payment here? you just hold your transfer for nothing, could you be able to count how many times I have sent you mails about this transfer which you have never responded.
THIS IS ONLY OPPORTUNITY YOU HAVE TO RECEIVE YOUR TOTAL FUND OF $10.7 MILLION USD.
I can't real know or understand the reason why you have decided and choose to abandon and lose your available fund payment transfer here, I sent you this mail before and I am writing to inform you once again that I have some money at hand to assist you but it is not yet complete and secondly you have to assured me that after I have help you that as soon as you receive your first payment that you will return all my supported money.
Beside I have $100 at hand as you know that the required fee is $125, now the remain fee is $25, which I asked the officer three good times to be sure that your fund will be release to you after you complete the remain $25 only without any more fee because you have paid a lot of fee and you have never received anything, he ensured me that nothing will stop you not to receive your fund the same day you sent the $500 fee only, so my dear I want you to go ahead and send the remain $25 immediately after you receive this mail because your first payment of $5000.00 will be send to you within 40 minutes after I confirmed the required fee of $25 okay,
I am assuring you now that you will never be disappointed after sending this fee today just let me know once you make the payment you will receive your first of $5000.00 within 40 minutes after receiving the Last fee from you. Bear it in mind that your total fund is the sum of $10.7 million and you will be receiving the sum of $5000.00 per day until you received your total fund completely.
Note, it has already be made available for your pickup but you cannot pick the money until you pay the needed fee of $25 only, here is the tracking status and result of your transaction which I have made for your pickup now and be inform that this transaction is real and confirmed and you will pickup your money within the 40 minutes after you have send the $25 fee only, view the status below and you will see and understand that you are the one delaying your fund for nothing, I am ready to release this total payment to you without wasting any time. 
Money Transfer Tracking
 	MTCN:    Available for pick up by receiver.
check status of another transfer
Thanks, and God bless as am looking forward to hearing from you as the fund's beneficiary.
THANKS FOR OUR PATRONAGE,
 YOURS SINCERELY
Mr. Dickson Ojadigoma 
 FOREIGN OPERATION MANAGER

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary fund,
body:
Dear Mr. Dickson Ojadigoma,

I appreciate your concern and persistence in this matter. However, I must clarify that I have not intentionally abandoned any payment or transfer. The lack of response from my end is due to the fact that I was not aware of such a fund existing in my name.

Before proceeding further, I would like to request more information about this fund. Could you please provide me with details regarding its origin and purpose? Also, could you explain why there is a fee required for me to access my own funds?

Once I have a clear understanding of these matters, we can discuss the next steps.

Best wishes,
Leland

subject: Attention Beneficiary fund,
body:
WESTERN UNION REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT
This message is from western union office and I hope that this message finds you in good health as well as your family. This is to inform you that the western union office has finalized the releasing of your total $10, million USD fund payment to you through our great service western union money transfer as it was instructed by the IMF office after our last meeting about the releasment of your fund.

We wish to inform you that your first payment of $5,000 dollars has been successfully sent on your name this morning through our great service western union and below is the information which you can use to pick up your payment. Note, that the transfer was placed on hold due to the Western Union Authorization charge of $100 which you are to pay in order for the payment to be completed, The other necessary processes has been completed and the payment will be released from on hold once the Western Union Authorization charge of $100 is paid.

Be informed that the payment is currently available in your name and you can also pick it with the sender's name and the MTCN number which I will send to you, the MTCN was placed on hold due to the Western Union Authorization charge of $100 like I have already explained to you.


Money Transfer Tracking

        MTCN:    Available for pick up by receiver.
check status of another transfer
[Green-icon]
Sent
[progress-line-green]
[Green-icon]
In progress
[progress-line-green]
[Green-icon]
Available





The transfer is ready for pick up. To collect it, the receiver should bring their government-issued ID and tracking number (MTCN) at nearby agent location.

In conclusion, I want to let you know that you have the very opportunity to receive your first payment of $5000 today by sending the $100 through western union, RIA, World Remit or money gram transfer for the Western Union Authorization charge. The payment will be released and will be ready for you to pick up at any western union location as soon as we confirm the $100 payment for the Western Union Authorization charge. We expect to hear from you Or Buy Gift Card Steam Wallet Card or iTunes Card of $100 usd

Be rest assured that you will confirm your payment within 45 minutes after I have confirmed and received the $100 from you, for your information, Nobody has the right to deduct or Added to the value of the funds due to it being pounded with Insurance policy. The instruction is from the Federal ministry of Finance.

I await your urgent response as soon as you read this message

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary fund,
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your email. However, I must inform you that I am unable to make the payment of $349.67 as requested. 

I would like to request more information about this process and why this fee is necessary. Could you please provide a detailed explanation?

Best wishes,
Leland

subject: Attention Beneficiary fund,
body: Thank you so much for your response, please I will like if you can reconfirm your details information and address to me, for confirmation of your fund payment transfer through this western union, and I can assure you that everything about your fund payment transfer will be done and completed without any delaying or excuse, I wait for your response now

subject: Attention Beneficiary fund,
body: Secondly, I have explained everything about this transaction to you through the first email I sent to you
